name: Phil
text: Well... you're a strange lookin fella.

name: Lorenz
text: My name's Lorenz, I'm looking for parts to fix my ship.

name: Lorenz
text: My ship crash landed here, and now I'm stranded unless I can fix it.

name: Phil
text: I see, well you came to the right place. I'm the salvager around here

name: Phil
text: I'm sure I can scrape up some parts for you, if you can do something for me

name: Phil
text: You see, the Whisps around here don't really like me too much

name: Phil
text: Let's just say they don't like what I do around here.
